content: is there a way to have a sticky message or topic that stays at the top of a stream?

@Grahame Grieve No, but that's one of our more requested features and we have an issue or two for it. cc @Tim Abbott -- this might be a good thing for somebody to prototype at PyCon, as I think even an unpolished version here could be really instructive.
@Grahame Grieve for some background, is what you want Zulip's "stream description" feature being displayed more visibly, or something that's more ephemeral than that?
An example text of such a message or topic would also be helpful.

well, I think that being able to force the display of the description would be good. The message would be something like:

  • [[Code of Conduct]] & [[Moderator]]
  • [[FAQ]]
  • [[Help Location]]
  • [[GitHub link]] - see [[Instructions for installing]]
Yeah, that's what I had had in mind for how to address this :smiley:
